lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I've got it!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: You figured out where her cat is? But you didn't even leave the room.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's montessori, my dear Tai. After deducing the implicit clues, scanning her behavior, and eliminating all other possibilities-

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Montessori, like a preschool?-

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I've concluded that her cat is most likely... drawn to cat food.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Let's go buy a bunch of cat food.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: What.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Let's go!
--- A little while later ---

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Admiral Snugglez, you had me worried sick! Shame on you for neglecting your officer duty!

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Come along home now, we've got a lot of planning to do.

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Oh thank you ever so much, Detective! Please take this reward.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: All in a day's work, ma'am.

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Yes, I'll be going now. Take care, Detective.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Sweet, a whole $20!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Don't you think that you should have negotiated higher?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What are you talking about, this is awesome!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I could buy like 8 burgers with this. That's about 3 days' worth of meals!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Locke... How much did the cat food cost?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: You didn't have to buy the fanciest cat food in the store!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Look, I'm a consummate professional and I take my cases very seriously.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And uh... $5.01 is still like a day's worth of food.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Locke... How do you stay alive?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh, I have my ways...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Anyways, sorry I didn't get to hang out with you today after all. I'll definitely be free tomorrow since it's Saturday and all.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Hm? Oh, it's no biggie.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Strange though. You usually only drop by the office. It's been a while since I've seen you stick around for the whole day.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Is something up?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well I just had a lot of free time today.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: But anyways, it's just nice every once in a while to see how you're doing with work. I worry sometimes.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Whaaat? I'm doing just fine!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But anyways, I'll see you tomorrow. If you want to meet up anywhere specific, just let me know on Ribbitter.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Alright, see you then Locke. Good work today!
